text: Fast Times at Ridgemont High is a 1982 American coming-of-age teen comedy movie. It was written by Cameron Crowe, directed by Amy Heckerling, produced by Irving Azoff and Art Linson. It is set in and around a high school in Southern California and follows several students over the course of a year. It stars Sean Penn, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Judge Reinhold, Phoebe Cates, Brian Backer, Robert Romanus, Ray Walston, Forest Whitaker, Nicolas Cage and Anthony Edwards. == Other websites == * Category:1982 comedy movies Category:1980s coming-of-age movies Category:1980s high school movies Category:1980s sex comedy movies Category:1980s teen comedy movies Category:American coming-of- age movies Category:American high school movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:Coming-of-age comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about suburbia Category:Movies set in California Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Amy Heckerling Category:Teen sex comedy movies Category:Teenage pregnancy in movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:United States National Film Registry movies
title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
